name: FootyPals App
description: This football app allows the user to stay up-to-date with all things Premier League in one place

name: Local Business Explorer
description: This Local Business Explorer app allows the user to search for any type of business in any city

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Using the concepts I have learned about server side API's to create a Weather Dashboard App

name: Daily Planner App
description: Using the concepts I have learned about local storage and moment to create a dynamically generated schedule that can be easily modified

name: Simple Javascript Quiz
description: A simple quiz game where questions are dynamically generated and scores are saved to a leaderboard. What is your high score?

name: Team Profile Generator
description: This is a tool for businesses to use that accepts user input via the command line and dynamically generates cards on a html page for each employee

name: Password Generator
description: This is a tool that can be used to generate a random password based on criteria you specify
